data.text: We always staying in Hampton hotel but we didn’t feel we are welcome maybe because they thinking we also team member by Hilton. The A/C in the room is very poor and very hot inside giving us hardtime. This is 1st and last time I will come here……..
data.title: Good place and very kind helpful guy life guard who assist us.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Kennethcydrexr,,

Greetings from Hampton by Hilton Al Seef. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. Please accept our sincere apology if your experience this time was not up to your expectation. Your comment is forwarded to the concerned managers to take the necessary action.

Once again, we apologize for our shortfalls.

Kind Regards,
Samantha Ngonyama
Guest Operations Manage
owner_response.author: Samantha Ngonyama

data.text: Perfect for short term, the hotel has everything you need to be comfy. Clean and good amenities ! Very good bedding, clean and well-equipped room, the breakfast is quality. The staff is friendly and attentive with the customer ! I recommand this hotel for all couple
data.title: Very good and pleasant stay

data.text: It's a 15min wall from Metro, Frant desk functional and attentive , room looks low budget styli but to the street side no privacy , good bed , bath OK,  good coffee/tea station with fresh milk. Breakfast average choice and very poor service, it's OK.
data.title: Low budget hotel in Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Pedtravel,

We are truly heartened to receive your generous review. Thank you for letting us know how much you enjoyed it, we are especially pleased that you felt well-looked after. We look forward to having you with us again in the near future.

Kind Regards,
Samantha Ngonyama
Guest Operations Manager
owner_response.author: Samantha Ngonyama

data.text:
I thoroughly enjoy staying at Hilton Hampton Al Seef for several reasons. The hotel's strategic location, easily accessible from the airport and overlooking the captivating Al Seef old city, is a standout feature. Over my nearly three years of visits, the consistently pleasant experiences have made this my preferred choice.

A special shoutout to Julius, Muni, Fatima, and Grita for their continuous kindness and support, contributing significantly to the overall comfort of my stays. Their exceptional service has consistently exceeded my expectations.

The rooms are spacious, well-maintained, and equipped with a fantastic air conditioning system. The impressive showers add an extra touch of luxury to the experience. Additionally, I'd like to express my gratitude to the diligent housekeeping staff, especially the young lady whose name escapes me at the moment, for her meticulous attention to cleaning details.

In summary, my stays at Hilton Hampton Al Seef have been consistently satisfying, thanks to the dedicated staff and excellent amenities. I look forward to returning soon for another delightful experience.

Karim
data.title: Exceptional Stay at Hilton Hampton Al Seef

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Karimbruxelles,

Thank you for your time to give a rating and sharing your experience with us. We do look forward to welcome you back to Hampton by Hilton Al Seef soon.

We will pass your regards to team :)

Kind Regards,
Samantha Ngonyama
Guest Operations Manager
owner_response.author: Samantha Ngonyama

data.text:
The hotel is next to the Al Seef Heritage Souq, a lovely tourist spot where we enjoyed walking and watching the Dubai lights and fireworks show at night along the creek.

It was our first time staying at this hotel and we were surprised that most services were self-service. We had to get bottled water from the check-in counter at the lobby and call service for bathrobes, towels, toiletries, and slippers. The service staff seemed annoyed when we asked for things and said it was not usual for them to deliver these things. There was no in-room dining service either, so we had to get food from the restaurants below and take them to our room. The free breakfast had an average food selection and a long line for coffee.

The room was clean and the bed was comfy. The hotel design was a mix of playful and boutique styles. The hotel was on a main road but the room was quiet and noise-free.

Overall, it was an interesting experience, but not as good as some Hilton properties in the area.
data.title: Great Location but Subpar Service
